text: Aah!
We're trapped!
[stomping]
[roaring]

Why is there even
a robot space bear chasing us?
I don't know!

What would a bear space robot
want with us?
I don't know!

Why would you call it
a bear space robot
instead of a robot space bear?

I don't know! Maybe it's because
the majority of it is a bear,

so I feel like
that should go first!

It's interesting
how the names we choose

highlight our different
perspectives!

You tend to ramble
when you're anxious!
I really do!
[roaring]

C'mon, I think
we can take it!

Wait! What if we tried
talking to it first?

You want to try talking
to the big scary growling thing?
C'mon, you of all people

should know
not to judge someone
based on how they look.
[Eliza] Hey! There you are!

I've been looking
all over for ya.

Why are you guys
hanging out in an alley?

-Eliza!
-Eliza!
[growling]
Aah! A space robot bear!

-Huh. Space robot bear.
-Huh? New perspective, new name.
Should we talk to it?

-See?
-What?

Well, if we
make friends with it,

we can use
its size and technology
to crush the patriarchy!
[laughter]

-Whoop, 'scuse me.
-Low bridge.

Hey, guys. Hanging out
in a sketchy alley, huh?
Cool.

-[roaring]
-Aah! A space robot creature!
[A-Spen] A bear robot creature!
That's definitely not a bear.

I can assure you
it is not from space.
Robot space bear.

Bear space robot.
Space robot bear.
You guys are all over the map.

-We really should pick a name.
-It is moving  really slow.

Well, whatever it is,
the five of us can take it down!

Alright, looks like
it's a tie...

two for talking
and two for fighting.

I am interested
in either outcome.

-Ugh!
-Ugh, so unhelpful.
♪  We're ready to throw down ♪

♪  We're sure
that it's a showdown ♪

♪  Zombie strength
Claws are out ♪
♪  Bet it's out to get us ♪
♪  We'll make it regret us ♪
♪  Ain't no time to back down ♪

♪  We don't know the truth
Why not call a truce? ♪

♪  Why start a war
when we can use words? ♪

♪ Try to coexist
Everybody wins ♪
♪ And nobody has to get hurt ♪
♪  We say fight! ♪
♪  We say talk! ♪

Or you could all get
your heads ripped off.
♪  What do we do right now? ♪
♪  What we gonna do right now? ♪
♪  What do we do right now? ♪

♪  What we gonna do right
do right, do right ♪

♪  Oh! Got a choice
to make, yeah! ♪

♪  Oh! Can't make
no mistakes, so ♪
♪  What do we do right now? ♪

♪  What we gonna
do right, do right ♪

♪  So glad to meet ya!
Can't wait to eat ya! ♪

♪  Bet you taste great
with some ranch ♪
♪  On a thin-crust pizza ♪

-Aah!
-I hate ranch dressing!
[Bear] Kidding! I was kidding!

I thought
we could go for gelato!

Well, I guess
they missed their chance

to get to know
a robot space bear.
[Zed] I knew it!
